text: Siw Hughes (born 16 January 1958) is a Welsh actress. She is best known for her role as Kath Jones in the long-running S4C soap opera, Pobol y Cwm, from 1993 to 2007, 2014 and 2017 onwards. ==Early life== Hughes was born in Bangor, Gwynedd. She has appeared in Welsh-language theatre productions, and in 2014 won a BAFTA Cymru award for Best Actress in a Television Drama, for her role in the S4C series Gwaith/Cartref. ==Career== Welsh comedian Iwan John has a running joke in which he spoofs the Kath Jones character, using such over- emphasised catch-phrases as "Blincin fflip!".S4C Adloniant/Entertainment ==Personal life== ==Filmography== ==Awards and nominations== {| class="wikitable" |- !
